sunsh(music "mus")ower

NAME rain2
DLG ITM_1
COL 3

DLG ITM_0
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG SPR_1
Sure enough, it's an incredibly sunny day,{br}but it also seems to be pouring rain.{sun = 1}

DLG SPR_0
"""
{
  - sun == 1 ?
    {clr3}Wow, it really is a sunshower.{br}
    ...{br}
    What if we...just went out and walked around in it?
    It might feel nice.{br}
    You go outside first, I'll follow you shortly.{clr3}
  - else ?
    {sequence
      - {clr3}Hey, did you hear that?{br}
        Sounded like it just started pouring outside.
        But it still seems super sunny?{clr3}
      - {clr3}Why don't you peek out the window and tell me what you see.{clr3}
    }
}
"""

DLG SPR_2
You found a nice warm cup of tea

DLG SPR_3
"""
{
  - inside == 1 ?
    {clr3}This seems like the perfect opportunity for {rbw}rainbows{rbw}, but I don't seem to see any.{br}
    I guess the sun at the wrong angle in the sky.
    Anyway, this was nice. Why don't we go inside now?{clr3} (end "{clr3}I'll grab some towels for us.{clr3}")
  - {item "rain1"} == 9 ?
    {clr3}Come stick your feet in the little stream here.{clr3} {feet = 1}
  - else ?
    {clr3}The rain feels really good, doesn't it?{clr3}
}
"""

DLG SPR_4
"""
It's the tree you planted in the front yard when you were little.
It has really grown over the years...
"""

DLG SPR_5
"""
{
  - feet == 1 ?
    {sequence
      - You dip your feet in the stream.{br}
        The water is warm.
      - You wiggle your feet a little, creating small splashes.
      - You stand in silence and become entranced as the clear water effortlessly rushes past your feet.
      - You think about the future to come.
        Can you flow into it as easily as a stream of water? {inside = 1}
    }
  - else ?
    A small stream of water has started running down the side of the road.
}
"""

DLG ITM_1
"""
{sequence
  - The road feels warm and rough under your bare feet.
    If it wasn't raining, you'd be worried about your feet getting burned on the hot pavement.
  - You can see a thin, faint layer of steam start to rise off the road.
}
"""

DLG ITM_2
"""
{shuffle
  - The air is filled with a wet, musty smell. It's a scent you love.
  - The grass is soft and damp. Loose blades stick to your feet.
  - The rain dampens your hair, which curls around your face and becomes frizzy.
  - A drop of rain hits you right in the eye. Whoops.
  - Your soft clothes start to cling to you as they get wetter.
  - With both the sun and the rain, everything you look at seems to hazily glisten.
  - You rub your arms a bit, letting the moisture seep into your skin.
  - The rain is so warm, but in the midst of the summer heatwave, you gladly accept it.
  - You wonder what your neighbors would think, seeing you and your sister just standing out in the rain.
}
"""

VAR sun
0

VAR feet
0

VAR inside
0
